prompt:
Nurse: That's good to hear, Mr. Stevens. Now, have you gained more than 2 pounds in the past day or 5 pounds in the past week?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's good to hear, Mr. Stevens. Lastly, have you been using more pillows at night to sleep?

Patient: No. I did not. Thank you.

Nurse: I apologize for the confusion earlier, Mr. Stevens. To confirm, you said you have not been using more pillows at night to sleep, correct?

Patient: Correct. Yes.

Nurse: I appreciate you letting me know. I'm going to take a moment to figure out the best way I can support you. I appreciate you letting me know. I'm going to take a moment to figure out the best way I can support you.

Patient: Alright. Thank you. End. Can you help me to what

responses.gpt4: Of course, Mr. Stevens. How can I assist you further?
responses.our_model: Of course, Mr. Stevens. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. It's a good idea to keep track of these symptoms at home every day. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can be a bit complicated. Do you have any questions about how to do so?
